name: Get
description: Extract a value from an Object, Array or String at the specified path.

arguments.name: Object
arguments.description: The Object, Array or String you want to extract an item from.

arguments.name: Path
arguments.description: The Path can be either a Number, a String, or an Array.

output.description: The value found at the Path. If no value is found, this value of the output is Null.
